trans-unit.source: Represents padding or margin information associated with a user interface (UI) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o preenchimento ou margem informações associadas a um elemento de interface (IU) do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The Padding structure represents the padding or margin associated with a rectangular UI element such as a control.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura de preenchimento representa o preenchimento ou margem associado um elemento de IU retangular como um controlo.

trans-unit.source: The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento é o espaço entre o corpo do elemento de IU e o respetivo limite interno.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a margin is the distance separating the adjoining edges of two adjacent UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Em contrapartida, a margem é a distância separar as extremidades adjoining de dois elementos de IU adjacentes.

trans-unit.source: Because of structural similarities, Padding is used to represent both padding and margins.
trans-unit.target: Devido a semelhanças estruturais, o preenchimento é utilizado para representar o preenchimento e as margens.

trans-unit.source: For a diagram that illustrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> properties on a control, see [Margin and Padding in Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para um diagrama que ilustra a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>as propriedades de um controlo, consulte [margem e preenchimento em controlos de formulários do Windows](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Padding has a different effect on controls that are containers than on controls that are not.
trans-unit.target: Preenchimento tem um efeito em controlos que são contentores que em controlos que não são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control, the Padding property defines the spacing between the border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controlo, a propriedade Padding define o espaçamento entre o limite do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>e respectivos controlos subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, the Padding property defines the spacing between the border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control and its contained text.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controlo, a propriedade Padding define o espaçamento entre o limite do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>controlo e do respetivo texto nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: In addition to typical methods and properties, Padding also defines the following type-level members: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty> field, which represents a predefined Padding with no padding.
trans-unit.target: Para além das propriedades e métodos típicos, preenchimento também define os seguintes membros de nível de tipo: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty>campo, o que representa um preenchimento predefinido com nenhuma preenchimento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty>

trans-unit.source: - A set of operators for performing common arithmetic operations for the class, such as adding two Padding objects together.
trans-unit.target: -Um conjunto de operadores para efetuar operações aritméticas comuns para a classe, como adicionar dois objetos de preenchimento em conjunto.

trans-unit.source: For languages that do not support operator overloading, you can invoke these members by using alternative method syntax.
trans-unit.target: Para os idiomas que não suportam a sobrecarga do operador, pode invocar esses membros, utilizando a sintaxe de método alternativo.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> properties, which provide combined values that are convenient for use in custom layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A>Propriedades, que fornecem valores combinados que são convenientes para utilização nos cálculos do esquema personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> class using the supplied padding size for all edges.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> com o tamanho de preenchimento fornecido para todas as extremidades de classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> properties to the value of the `all` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>Propriedades para o valor da `all` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels to be used for padding for all edges.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels a ser utilizado para preenchimento para todas as extremidades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> class using a separate padding size for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> utilizando um tamanho de preenchimento separado para cada limite de classe.

trans-unit.source: If all of the parameter values are equal, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property will reflect this common value.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os valores de parâmetro são iguais, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>propriedade irá refletir este valor comum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite superior.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite direito.

trans-unit.source: The padding size, in pixels, for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite inferior.

trans-unit.source: Computes the sum of the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Calcula a soma de dois especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that contains the sum of the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que contém a soma de dois especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for all the edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para todas as margens.

trans-unit.source: When retrieving this property, if all the edges use the same padding value, then this common value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ao obter esta propriedade se todas as extremidades utilizam o mesmo valor de preenchimento, em seguida, é devolvido este valor comuns.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, -1 is returned to indicate that all the padding values are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é devolvido -1 para indicar que todos os valores de preenchimento não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Definição alterações este valor a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for all edges if the same; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, para todas as extremidades se o mesmo; -caso contrário,&1;.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para o limite inferior.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível alterar este valor de definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the bottom edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite inferior.

trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> object with no padding.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objecto com não preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: An empty padding object is defined as having the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> padding properties set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de preenchimento vazio está definido como tendo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>Preenchimento propriedades definida como 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: This immutable field is useful for comparison operations and initializations.
trans-unit.target: Este campo imutável é útil para as operações de comparação e inicializações.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the specified object is equivalent to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor do objeto especificado é equivalente à atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only other objects of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> (or a derived type) can be equal to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.
trans-unit.target: Apenas os outros objetos do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>(ou um tipo derivado) pode ser igual a atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> properties for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objects must be the same.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>Propriedades para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>objetos têm de ser iguais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos são equivalentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> values to generate a 32-bit hash code that represents the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.
trans-unit.target: O método GetHashCode utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>os valores</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> para gerar um código hash de 32 bits que representa o atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code is a number that corresponds to the value of an object (so two objects that have the same value should generate the same hash code).
trans-unit.target: Um código hash é um número que corresponde ao valor de um objeto (para que os dois objetos que têm o mesmo valor devem gerar o mesmo código hash).

trans-unit.source: Hash codes are used to sort and store collections of objects.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de hash utilizados para ordenar e armazenar coleções de objetos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable?displayProperty=fullName> represents a collection of key-and-value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable?displayProperty=fullName>representa uma coleção de pares chave-valor que se encontram organizados de com base no código hash da chave.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on hash codes and hash functions, see the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre códigos de hash e as funções de hash, consulte o <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash de número inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets the combined padding for the right and left edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o preenchimento combinado para as margens direita e esquerdas.

trans-unit.source: This property is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é conveniente para utilização em muitos cálculos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sum, in pixels, of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right*> padding values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a soma, em pixels, do <> </> *> e <> </> *> preenchimento valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para o limite esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível alterar este valor de definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the left edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: Performs vector addition on the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects, resulting in a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa a adição de vetor em dois especificados <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos, resultando numa nova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A vector addition operation is the result of adding the padding values for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de adição de vetor é o resultado da adição os valores de preenchimento para cada limite.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> property of the result is the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> properties of the two operands.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>propriedade do resultado é a soma do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>Propriedades de dois operandos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: This operation is transitive.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação é transitiva.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A new that results from adding p1 and p2.
trans-unit.target: A new that results from adding p1 and p2.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> objects are equal if the padding values for each of the four edges – <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> – are the same for both objects.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>objetos são iguais, se o preenchimento valores para cada um dos quatro margens – <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>– são os mesmos para ambos os objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dois <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos não são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: This operation is the inverse of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação é o inverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.op_Equality%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.op_Equality%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to test.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects are different; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dois <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos são diferentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs vector subtraction on the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> objects, resulting in a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Efetua vetor subtração as duas especificadas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> objetos, resultando numa nova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A vector subtraction operation is the result of subtracting the padding values for each edge.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de subtração vetor é o resultado da subtraindo os valores de preenchimento para cada limite.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> property of the result is the difference between the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> properties of two operands.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>propriedade do resultado é a diferença entre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>Propriedades de dois operandos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to subtract from (the minuend).
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> subtrair (o minuend).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> to subtract from (the subtrahend).
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> subtrair (o subtrahend).

trans-unit.source: The result of subtracting p2 from p1.
trans-unit.target: The result of subtracting p2 from p1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento da extremidade direita.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível alterar este valor de definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the right edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite direito.

trans-unit.source: Gets the padding information in the form of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de preenchimento sob a forma de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Size property performs a type conversion from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding> to <xref:System.Drawing.Size?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Size efetua uma conversão de tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>para <xref:System.Drawing.Size?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A> property corresponds to the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A> property corresponds to the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>propriedade corresponde ao <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A>propriedade corresponde de <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Vertical%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Horizontal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Size is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é conveniente para utilização em muitos cálculos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> containing the padding information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as informações de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value from another.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valor a partir de outra.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that contains the result of the subtraction of one specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value from another.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que contém o resultado da subtração de um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valor a partir de outra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding value for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de preenchimento para o limite superior.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value can also alter the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível alterar este valor de definição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.All%2A>

trans-unit.source: The padding, in pixels, for the top edge.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento, em pixels, para o limite superior.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string containing the labeled values of the padding for all four edges.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve uma cadeia que contém os valores de preenchimento para todas as extremidades de quatro identificados.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the combined padding for the top and bottom edges.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o preenchimento combinado para as margens superior e inferior.

trans-unit.source: This property is convenient for use in many layout calculations.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é conveniente para utilização em muitos cálculos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sum, in pixels, of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom*> padding values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a soma, em pixels, do <> </> *> e <> </> *> preenchimento valores.
